sentences.en: A few scandalous whores have been sent to the House of Correction.
sentences.cn: 有几个声名狼藉的妓女被送进了教养院.

sentences.en: Advice and correction roll off him like water off a duck's back.
sentences.cn: 劝导对他好象水过鸭背似的(不起作用).

sentences.en: At present most methods employ digital computations and certain correction techniques that minimize instrumental errors.
sentences.cn: 目前大多数方法是采用电子计算机,同时配合一定的校正技术,以减少仪器误差.

sentences.en: Correction of palate clefts is much more difficult and usually not as satisfactory.
sentences.cn: 硬腭裂的矫正更为困难,且常不理想.

sentences.en: Do not forget to keep the subject within the parallax correction mark.
sentences.cn: 别忘了让被摄主体保持在视差纠正线之内.

sentences.en: Equity is a correction of common legal rules in their defective parts.
sentences.cn: 衡平法是对普通法律规则中瑕疵部分的矫正.

sentences.en: I just need to make a few corrections , and then we can send it to the printer.
sentences.cn: 我只要修改几个地方，然后就可以把它发送到打印机。
对我说的话请予以指正.

sentences.en: It means that there is no first - order correction to the frequency of waves.
sentences.cn: 这就意味着,不存在对波的频率的一 阶 改正项.

sentences.en: Many instruments are equipped to carry out this background correction on an automatic basis.
sentences.cn: 许多仪器已经装备了这种自动本底校正器.

sentences.en: The correction had already been set in type.
sentences.cn: 那处修正已经出现在铅字纸上。

sentences.en: The correction is only partial, particularly for transients.
sentences.cn: 这个校正仅是局部的, 对于瞬变过程尤其如此.

sentences.en: The prisoner was sent to a labor camp for correction.
sentences.cn: 囚犯被判往劳工营改过自新.

sentences.en: There are some programming errors that need correction.
sentences.cn: 有一些程式错误需要修改.

sentences.en: We try to find a correction to the frequency of waves.
sentences.cn: 我们试图找出对波的频率的改正量.

words.tran_cn: 纠正；改正（correct的过去分词）；制止

phrases.tran_cn: 视差改正量，天体高度视差改正量；视差校正
剖面调整；齿廓修正，廓形修正
不一定完全对；有待改正

trans.tran_en: a change made in something in order to make it right or better
